page.title: 12Sport Centre Report Cont.
page.content: he works with would get 2,000000pounds. The Sports Centre covers a lot of ground, about 1.5 acres.The pool,to add to the size and cost, holds 66,000 gallons. The pool is cleaned every two years. Last year, 1984, 330,000 people used the Centre's facilities (and the bar!). As expected, the Centre gets a lot of lost property. They get so much of it, that which isn't claimed is thrown away. Some things, like a sheep skin coat, or a wallet, are kept. Even with all the money, the Sports Centre complex took two years to build.
